mapper.select: SELECT cn.id, c.COUPON_NAME AS coupon_name, c.discount_value AS discount_value, c.NOTE, cn.STATUS, c.VALID_TO AS valid_to, u.USER_ID AS user_id FROM coupons c JOIN coupons_now cn ON cn.COUPONS_ID = c.id JOIN users u ON cn.users_id = u.id WHERE u.USER_ID = #{user_id} ORDER BY c.VALID_TO desc
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM coupons c JOIN coupons_now cn ON cn.COUPONS_ID = c.id JOIN users u ON cn.users_id = u.id WHERE u.USER_ID = #{user_id}
SELECT user_id as user_id, email, password, name, phone, birth, email, postcode, address, detail_address as detailAddress FROM USERS WHERE user_id = #{user_id}

SELECT A.id AS id, A.board_type AS board_type, A.board_type2 AS board_type2, A.board_type3 AS board_type3, A.title AS title, A.user_id AS userId, A.content AS content, A.hits AS hits, A.look AS look, A.created_at AS createdAt FROM board A WHERE A.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY A.created_at DESC OFFSET #{pageRequestDTO.offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageRequestDTO.size} ROWS ONLY
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board A WHERE A.user_id = #{userId}
